body_html:
Is it possible to build the tensorflow pip wheel with the following version of bazel ?

[sfux@develop01 ~]$ bazel version
..
Build label: 0.2.3- (@non-git)
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Mon Jun 6 08:27:55 2016 (1465201675)
Build timestamp: 1465201675
Build timestamp as int: 1465201675
[sfux@develop01 ~]$
